name: Fabricator
movement: climb 15 ft., walk 30 ft., swim 15 ft.
description: The Fabricator is a Large Construct with exceptional durability, designed for creating objects from raw materials. It has a robust mechanical structure, highlighted by its impressive size and the capacity to manipulate materials.
memorable: Its ability to permanently disassemble creatures and their nonmagical equipment creates a unique tactical dynamic in encounters.
goals: To create useful items and defend itself from threats.
relations: Could potentially be allied with artisans or other constructs, but might also be an adversary to those who threaten it.
environment: Typically found in areas with abundant raw materials, such as workshops or ruins.
strengths: High hit points, damage immunities to force and poison, and the ability to craft items.
weaknesses: Poor social interaction due to a low Charisma score and a low Dexterity, making it less agile.
attacks: Multiattack with two disassembling slam attacks dealing bludgeoning and force damage, permanently disassembling foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Dismantling Form ability inflicts damage on those who attack it and weakens nonmagical weapons.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Proficient in Perception, giving it a passive perception score of 16.
additional_information: Can create various objects by combining absorbed materials.
Immunity to several conditions including being charmed and frightened.
Can dismantle nonmagical weapons and ammunition when struck.
Strong offensive capabilities thanks to its high Strength.
Capable of tactical flexibility by choosing to spare defeated creatures.
test_queries: large construct that crafts useful items
